resources.string:
We would like to acknowledge the following for this app:
 1. Professional Android Sensing for Sensing knowledge.
 2. Mansoor for his assistance in the tutorials.
 3. Professor Intille for teaching the class.
 4. Icon: http://findicons.com/icon/54145/frog.
 5. Graphics: 
 Frog image: http://www.flickr.com/photos/61104766@N04/5564827664/ 
 Fly image: http://www.elisabethhubert.com/blog/page/7/ 
 Log image: http://graphicriver.net/item/bark-05-red-brown/73866 
 Turtle shell image: http://sweetclipart.com/cute-green-turtle-696 
 Lilly pad image: http://www.mpmschoolsupplies.com/p-15810-classic-accents-lily-pad-one-design.aspx 
 Rock image: http://www.123rf.com/photo_4638192_one-river-rock-on-white-background.html 
 6. Sounds: http://soundbible.com/tags-jump.html 
 7. Music: http://vimeo.com/45191238, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmar4gh5nIw
 8. Phones tested: LG Nexus 5, Samsung Galaxy S4. Samsung Galaxy S3, LG Optimus Slider
 9. Special thanks to Rebecca Nardi.
Your total game time was: %s seconds.
You are now ranked number %s in the high scores!

Hop with Me combines two important daily values, fun and exercise. 
 Navigate your frog through challenging worlds while you control it by squatting then jumping and swiping.
 
 Experience new levels with every playthrough, compete with friends on the leaderboards, 
 and get in shape with Hop with Me!
Welcome to Hop with Me! To move forward all you need to do is squat then jump!\n Give it a try!
Good job! Now you don\'t want to fall into the water!\n To turn the frog swipe the direction you want to go! Give it a shot!\n
OK, these are logs! Logs or turtles will be traveling across the screen.\n Be careful not to get carried away by the logs or turtles!\n Let it carry you to the next lilly pad and jump off!
Look it\'s a fly! Collect these to get an even higher score!\n Just hop over it to grab it!

Congratulations you made it!
 Try and make it across the pond each level!
 Be careful though, the stream gets faster each time!
 Happy Hopping!
